scripts.doc: lerna run doc ; cp -r doc-assets docs; git add docs/doc-assets
scripts.clean: lerna clean --yes; lerna run clean; rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json; find . -name "node_modules" -exec rm -rf '{}' +;
scripts.all: npm run clean ; npm install ; npm run build ; npm run doc ; npm test
scripts.test-clone: rm -rf ../cli-driver-test; mkdir ../cli-driver-test; cd ../cli-driver-test; git clone ../cli-driver/.git;  cd cli-driver ; yarn install ; yarn test
scripts.test-nobuild-nolerna: cd packages/cli-driver ; npm run test-nobuild && cd ../sample-app-using-inquirer && npm run test-nobuild
